about_the_game:
Can you reach level 100?



Use your Qwepoi super cannon to paint all the Infantry ships that dare to enter the base without being painted!! How absurd!!! Sacrilege!!! The game gets more difficult as you pass the level. The ships can appear from six different rows, and there are six keys for you to paint them, before they reach the bottom of the screen
(Q, W, E, I, O, P - and their respective on the Controller).

I hope you have a lot of fun playing! :)



Qwepoi game have some features, and it keeps updating:

  • Ranking online: After 1.2+ version, adds an online ranking to players compete for TOP 10!
  • Authorial Soundtrack: Your addictive and frenetic little music sets the rhythm for the game, and hyperfocus is constant!
  • Pause and Options: Feeling tired? No worries, pausing and muting the game is easy!
  • Progressive Challenge: Each level gets more difficult, giving you a chance to develop your skills as you progress.
  • Achievements: Steam achievements up to Level 99—can you conquer the difficulty of Level 30+?
  • Duo Play: Thanks to Steam Remote Play, you can invite your friend to be “I, O, P,” while you take on “Q, W, E”! Romantic, isn’t it?
  • Tutorial: The initial screen with the game title helps you learn and practice without penalties.
  • Growing Community: After version 1.3+, the game now supports Portuguese and English. I hope other localizations will follow as the community helps improve the game on Discord. Many bugs have been fixed based on community feedback, and I’m immensely grateful!



Join our , help the game grow, make new friends who are also Qwepoi proplayers, and have fun with us! 🎮🌟

Thanks everyone for all support and for playing!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU - Example: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300, Raspberry Pi 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support - Example: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU - Example: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600, Raspberry Pi 5 with overclocking
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support - Example: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Qwepoi is a speed arcade spaceshooter game using both hands in Q, W, E, I, O, P keys (or even in controller), where you must paint the Infantry ships before they enter the base! Each level inscreases the challenge!
